FIX-M2-ORCHESTRATION.title: Structural M2 Integrity via Post-Phase Hook
FIX-M2-ORCHESTRATION.instruction:
Implement a structural guarantee for M2 integrity: 1. Modify TickOrchestrator to ensure Government.process_monetary_transactions is called as a mandatory post-step (e.g., in _drain_and_sync_state or _finalize_tick) to capture ALL transactions including ones generated late. 2. Remove redundant/manual calls from phases. 3. Call reset_tick_flow() properly.
